amendment.description: Amendment requires all Federal agencies funded by this bill to provide only forthright and truthful statements or representations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds used in contravention of paragraph (1), (2), or (3) of section 1001(a) of title 18, United State Code.
